Activity details: Eprinomecti n 5Mg 6,660 Litres (Boehringer Ingeheim Animal Health)
Summary of findings:  Of the 6,660 doses procured, it was noted that 2,794 doses only were issued out with 3,866 left in stores at year end.  Retaining large number of quantities in stock year-end despite the unprecedented episodes of tick borne diseases casts doubt on the needs assessment at the by a
service Conclusion regarding delivery-:  The anticipated of the services controlling unprecedented episodes of tick borne diseases in the country have not been fully achieved despite availability of acaricides.
Managemen t response:  The Ministry was processing approvals from districts that had reported tick resistance to acaricides.
